Text: GTV status files Cc Attached are the notes and latest timeline from this weeks GTVII status meeting Bill Fortney
GTV status files Cc Attached are the notes and latest timeline from this weeks GTVII status meeting If Zhiyong has already mailed the notes please forgive this duplicate copy Bill Fortney

GTV files and update on Zhiyong Wei Cc Attached are the notes from this weeks Gas Trading Vision II status meeting and latest timeline for the project Zhiyong called and asked me to review the notes and forward them to you in his absence In case you have not heard he was involved in an accident this morning on his way to work He was broadsided pulling out of a parking lot The impact ruptured a bone in his leg and breaking glass hit the left side of his face He is expecting to be out of the office for about two weeks during his recovery He is currently recovering at home and can be reached by phone and email Please let me know if you have questions or need additional clarification after reviewing the notes Bill Fortney
